B

Battleship - Class in main.java
The Model of the application, where each object is a battleship board, represented by a 2D array.
Battleship(Peer) - Constructor for class main.java.Battleship
Constructor for the player2 (the player connecting to a host)
Battleship(Server) - Constructor for class main.java.Battleship
Constructor for the player1 (the host)
BattleshipState - Enum in main.java
Constants that represent all possible states the Battleship Model can be in

C

connect() - Method in class main.java.Server
Attempt to connect to a client by accepting any connection to the ServerSocket
createBoards() - Method in class main.java.GUI
Function to create the player and enemy boards Sets the initial contents of the Boards.
createMenuBar() - Method in class main.java.GUI
Function to initialize the menu bar and its components
createPanels() - Method in class main.java.GUI
Function to initialize all the planels and subpanels used in the View.
createText() - Method in class main.java.GUI
Function to set the text fields on the GUI.
createToolbar() - Method in class main.java.GUI
function to initialize the toolbar and all the buttons and their functions

D

DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class main.java.Peer
constant for default port
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class main.java.Server
Default port constant

E

enemyBoard - Variable in class main.java.Battleship
Opponent board represented as 2D array of constants

F

fireAt(int, int) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Function to facilitate an enemy firing at the player's board
fireResult(int, int, int) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Function to update the current player's view of the enemy board, based on the result of their guess.

G

getPort() - Method in class main.java.Peer
getter for the port value
getPort() - Method in class main.java.Server
getter for the port value
getServer() - Method in class main.java.Peer
getter for the server address
getState() - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Getter for current state
GUI - Class in main.java
The View of the application which controlls how the User visualized the Model, and how the user will interact with the model
GUI(Battleship, String) - Constructor for class main.java.GUI
View contructor which initializes the window, and creates all components in their initial state

H

hideGUI() - Method in class main.java.GUI
Function to remove the View from the User's screen
HIT - Static variable in class main.java.Battleship
 

I

isConnectionClosed() - Method in class main.java.Peer
Check if the connection is closed
isOver() - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Check if the game s over by passing through the player's board and checking how many unmarked ship are left

M

Main - Class in main.java
Main class, which is the controller class for this application.
Main() - Constructor for class main.java.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.java.Main
The main function which is the controller of the Application.
main.java - package main.java
 
MISS - Static variable in class main.java.Battleship
 
myBoard - Variable in class main.java.Battleship
Player board represented as 2D array of constants

N

NONE - Static variable in class main.java.Battleship
 

P

p - Variable in class main.java.Battleship
Client/Server objects, depending on the player.
p1_score - Static variable in class main.java.Main
Global for Player 1 score
p2_score - Static variable in class main.java.Main
Global for Player 2 score
Peer - Class in main.java
Peer object, whic represents a user connecting to a ServerSocket
Peer(String) - Constructor for class main.java.Peer
Constructor which connects to the server address, using the default port
Peer(String, int) - Constructor for class main.java.Peer
Constructor which connects using the server address and port number
placeShip1(Random) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Place a random ship of length 1 on myBoard
placeShip2(Random) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Place a random ship of length 2 on myBoard
placeShip3(Random) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Place a random ship of length 3 on myBoard
placeShip4(Random) - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Place a random ship of length 4 on myBoard
player - Variable in class main.java.Battleship
integer representation of the player if player is 1, player is the host if player is 2, player is the peer
printMyBoard() - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Print method to print the player's board Key: S - Ship X - Hit Ship W - Water M - Miss E - Error (invalid data)
processChar(char) - Static method in class main.java.Main
Simple helper function to process a char primitive and turn it into an int Maps chars to int value 0-9 starting from char 'a' to 'j'

R

randomize() - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Function to randomize the ship placements using the myBoard object Ships of length 4, 3, 2, and 1 will be randomly spread through the 10x10 board
receive() - Method in class main.java.Peer
method to receive a message from the server
receive() - Method in class main.java.Server
method to receive a message from the client
recv() - Method in class main.java.Battleship
Wrapper for the receive method in the Peer/Server object

S

setP2Winner() - Method in class main.java.GUI

U
